languages.text: Провидец Муаран вел в битву поредевшее воинство тех, кому когда-то был дарован приют на Янусе. Время, проведенное в логове зла, забрало слишком многих из них и наполнило отчаянием душу Муарана. Эльдарское колдовство оказалось бессильно, и под издевательский хохот Той, Что Жаждет он наблюдал, как души его собратьев поглощаются ненасытным божеством. А затем в отвратительном чреве сгинул и он сам.

The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.
languages.original_text: Провидец Муаран вел в битву поредевшее воинство тех, кому когда-то был дарован приют на Янусе. Время, проведенное в логове зла, забрало слишком многих из них и наполнило отчаянием душу Муарана. Эльдарское колдовство оказалось бессильно, и под издевательский хохот Той, Что Жаждет он наблюдал, как души его собратьев поглощаются ненасытным божеством. А затем в отвратительном чреве сгинул и он сам.

traits.locale_text: Farseer Muaran lead to battle the thinned-down army of those who were once given shelter on Janus. The time spent in the den of evil took too many of them, and Muaran's soul with despair. Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and soon the scoffing laughter of She Who Thirsts accompanied him, as he watched the souls of his brethren being consumed by the insatiable deity. And then he too vanished in her hideous maw.

Farseer Muaran lead to battle the thinned-down army of those who were once given shelter on Janus. The time spent in the den of evil took too many of them, and Muaran's soul with despair. Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and soon the scoffing laughter of She Who Thirsts accompanied him, as he watched the souls of his brethren being consumed by the insatiable deity. And then he too vanished in her hideous maw.

Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. languages.text: 先知穆兰带领那些在加努斯上得到庇护的族人投入战斗。他们人数稀少，而在邪恶巢穴里度过的时光已带走了太多同胞，这让穆兰的灵魂充满了绝望。即便是艾达灵族的巫术也无力扭转战局，他眼睁睁地看着族人的灵魂被饥渴女士吞噬，贪婪邪神的嘲笑声传入他的耳中，随后，他也葬身于她那恐怖的巨口之中。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: 先知穆兰带领那些在加努斯上得到庇护的族人投入战斗。他们人数稀少，而在邪恶巢穴里度过的时光已带走了太多同胞，这让穆兰的灵魂充满了绝望。即便是艾达灵族的巫术也无力扭转战局，他眼睁睁地看着族人的灵魂被饥渴女士吞噬，贪婪邪神的嘲笑声传入他的耳中，随后，他也葬身于她那恐怖的巨口之中。

languages.text: Der Runenprophet Muaran führte die arg dezimierte Armee derer in die Schlacht, die einst Zuflucht auf Janus gefunden hatten. Ihre Zeit im Hort des Bösen hatte zu viele von ihnen gefordert und Muarans Seele mit Verzweiflung erfüllt. Die Hexerei des Aeldari war machtlos, und er hörte nur das spöttische Lachen von Ihr, die dürstet, während er zusah, wie die Seelen seiner Verwandten von der unstillbaren Gottheit verschlungen wurden. Dann verschwand auch er in ihrem widerwärtigen Schlund.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: Der Runenprophet Muaran führte die arg dezimierte Armee derer in die Schlacht, die einst Zuflucht auf Janus gefunden hatten. Ihre Zeit im Hort des Bösen hatte zu viele von ihnen gefordert und Muarans Seele mit Verzweiflung erfüllt. Die Hexerei des Aeldari war machtlos, und er hörte nur das spöttische Lachen von Ihr, die dürstet, während er zusah, wie die Seelen seiner Verwandten von der unstillbaren Gottheit verschlungen wurden. Dann verschwand auch er in ihrem widerwärtigen Schlund.

languages.text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran mena au combat une maigre armée formée de ceux qui avaient autrefois trouvé refuge sur Janus. Le temps passé dans l'antre du mal avait éclairci leurs rangs et empli de désespoir le cœur de Muaran. La sorcellerie aeldari se révéla cependant impuissante et il n'entendit que le rire moqueur de l'Assoiffée tandis que les âmes de ses semblables étaient dévorées par la déesse insatiable. Puis il disparut à son tour dans l'abominable gueule.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: Le Grand Prophète Muaran conduisit au combat une maigre armée formée de ceux qui avaient autrefois trouvé refuge sur Janus. Le temps passé dans l'antre du mal avait éclairci leurs rangs et empli de désespoir le cœur de Muaran. La sorcellerie aeldari se révéla cependant impuissante et il n'entendit que le rire moqueur de l’Assoiffée tandis que les âmes de ses semblables étaient dévorées par la déesse insatiable. Puis il disparut à son tour dans l'abominable gueule.

languages.text: El vidente Muaran lideró en combate al escaso ejército de quienes una vez encontraron refugio en Janus. Su paso por la guarida del mal había costado demasiadas vidas y llenó el alma de Muaran de desesperación. La hechicería del Aeldari era inútil, y solo pudo oír la risa burlona de la Sedienta mientras observaba cómo la deidad insaciable devoraba las almas de sus hermanos. Después, él también desapareció en sus horribles fauces.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: El vidente Muaran lideró en combate al escaso ejército de quienes una vez encontraron refugio en Janus. Su paso por la guarida del mal había costado demasiadas vidas y llenó el alma de Muaran de desesperación. La hechicería del Aeldari era inútil, y solo pudo oír la risa burlona de la Sedienta mientras observaba cómo la deidad insaciable devoraba las almas de sus hermanos. Después, él también desapareció en sus horribles fauces.

languages.text: 先見司のムアランは、かつてはヤヌスで聖域を与えられたものの、今となってはまばらとなった軍勢を率いて戦った。悪の巣で大きすぎる犠牲を払わされたムアランの心は絶望で満たされた。アエルダリの魔術は無力だった。彼はなす術もなくかの渇きたる女の嘲笑を聞きながら、同族の魂が強欲な神に喰らわれてゆくのを見ていた。ムアラン自身も、おぞましき口腹の露と消えた。
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: 先見司のムアランは、かつてはヤヌスで聖域を与えられたものの、今となってはまばらとなった軍勢を率いて戦った。悪の巣で大きすぎる犠牲を払わされたムアランの心は絶望で満たされた。アエルダリの魔術は無力だった。彼はなす術もなくかの渇きたる女の嘲笑を聞きながら、同族の魂が強欲な神に喰らわれてゆくのを見ていた。ムアラン自身も、おぞましき口腹の露と消えた。

languages.text: Ötesezen Muaran, bir zamanlar Janus'a sığınmasına izin verilen, iyice küçülmüş ordusunu savaşa yolladı. Kötülük yuvasında geçirdikleri zaman, sayılarını çok azaltmış ve Muaran'ın ruhunu ümitsizlikle doldurmuştu. Aeldari'nin büyüleri güçsüzdü, tek duyabildiğiyse soydaşlarının ruhlarını tüketen, doymak bilmez tanrı Susayan'ın alaycı kahkahalarıydı. Nihayetinde o da onun o korkunç ağzında yok oldu.
languages.original_text: The Farseer Muaran led the now sparse army of those who had once been given sanctuary on Janus into battle. Their time in the den of evil had taken too many of them and filled Muaran's soul with despair. The Aeldari's sorcery was powerless, and he heard only the mocking laughter of She Who Thirsts as he watched the souls of his kin be consumed by the insatiable deity. Then he too vanished into her hideous maw.

traits.locale_text: Ötesezen Muaran, bir zamanlar Janus'a sığınması için izin verilen ve oldukça küçülmüş ordusunu muharebeye gönderdi. Kötülük yuvasında geçirdikleri zaman, sayılarını çok azaltmış ve Muaran'ın ruhunu ümitsizlikle doldurmuştu. Aeldari'nin büyüleri güçsüzdü ve tek duyabildiği, soydaşlarının ruhlarını tüketen doymak bilmez tanrı Susayan'ın alaycı kahkahalarıydı. Ardından o da onun o korkunç ağzında yok oldu.
